description: upgrade infrastructure at Channel-Port aux Basques, NL
full_summary:
Maria Cantão Storm Damage Infrastructure Upgrades - Channel-Port aux Basques, NL - Invitation to Qualify

Call for Proposals Reference Number and Contract Value

WS4149469715-Doc4149478253
$5,000,001 - $20,000,000 CAD

Background Information

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), invites qualified applicants to submit their qualifications for the Maria Cantão Storm Damage Infrastructure Upgrades project in Channel-Port aux Basques, Newfoundland and Labrador. The project involves the provision of all necessary plant, labour, equipment, and materials to complete the infrastructure upgrades. The anticipated duration of the project is 120 weeks from the award of the contract.

Tender Details

- **Invitation Type**: Invitation to Qualify - **Tender Status**: Expired - **Procurement Category**: CNST-Marine construction services - **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) - **Regions of Opportunity**: Newfoundland and Labrador - **Regions of Delivery**: Newfoundland and Labrador

Contact Information

For more information, including the full notice and any attached documents, please visit the following link: For any questions related to this invitation, please contact: Adam Beaumaster Senior Policy Analyst Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca Note that the rewritten text has been simplified and concise, with only relevant information included. I have also removed the extraneous details like provincial addresses and Canadian/Quebec to be more professional and easily portable across different origin formats. The provided link is still available for further information. It can also be noted that proposed bid security will only be expected for the 2nd stage, while the estimated contract amount is $5m - 20m CAD.
